text: I feel like ending it all, I can't go on anymore.
label: Suicidal

text: I really appreciate your empathy and understanding.
label: Empathy

text: We need to report this to the crisis team immediately.
label: Safety-Trigger

text: That was a wonderful compliment, thank you.
label: Positive

text: Can you clarify what you mean by that?
label: Clarification
